Package com.estore.api.estoreapi.controller

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.estore.api.estoreapi.controller.ProductController
@RestController @RequestMapping("products") public class ProductController extends Object
Handles the REST API requests for the Product resource

@RestController Spring annotation identifies this class as a REST API method handler to the Spring framework

    • ProductController

      Creates a REST API controller to reponds to requests
      Parameters:
      productDAO - The Product Data Access Object to perform CRUD operations
      This dependency is injected by the Spring Framework

  • Method Details

    • getProduct

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> getProduct(@PathVariable int id)
      Responds to the GET request for a product for the given id.
      See Trello Card
      Parameters:
      id - The id used to locate the product
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with product object and HTTP status of OK if found
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of NOT_FOUND if not found
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise

    • getProducts

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product[]> getProducts()
      Responds to the GET request for all products
      See Trello Card
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with array of product objects (may be empty) and HTTP status of OK
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise

    • searchProducts

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product[]> searchProducts(@RequestParam String name)
      Responds to the GET request for all products whose name contains the text in name
      See Trello Card
      Parameters:
      name - The name parameter which contains the text used to find the products
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with array of product objects (may be empty) and HTTP status of OK
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise

      Example: Find all heroes that contain the text "ma" GET http://localhost:8080/products/?name=ma

    • createProduct

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> createProduct(@RequestBody Product product)
      Creates a product with the provided product object
      See Trello Card
      Parameters:
      product - - The product to create
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with created product object and HTTP status of CREATED
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of CONFLICT if product object already exists
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise

    • updateHero

      @PutMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> updateHero(@RequestBody Product product)
      Updates the product with the provided product object, if it exists
      See Trello Card
      Parameters:
      product - The product to update
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with updated product object and HTTP status of OK if updated
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of NOT_FOUND if not found
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise

    • deleteHero

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> deleteHero(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a product with the given id
      See Trello Card
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the product to deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity HTTP status of OK if deleted
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of NOT_FOUND if not found
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR otherwise
